title: Victorian vintage
brief_description: Dr. W.S. Benwell, a wine specialist, takes the viewer on a conducted tour of the wine growing areas of Victoria. Includes Yeringberg, an old vineyard which has been re-established near Melbourne, Bailey’s vineyard and the Rutherglen Wine Festival, the Swan Hill area, Chateau Tahbilk, the Grampians area of Western Victoria (Great Western Champagne country) and back to Melbourne.
